title: onrE paramporuLAm
sahitya:
onrE paramporuLAm pala ulaga viLaiyADal adan aruLAm uNmai


anupallavi

  ninroru nilaiyilE nILuyirkk-uyirAga nIkkamarak-kalandu pOkku varavumaTra


caraNam    haranenrum nara nAraNanenrum guruparanenrum brahmanenrum
allA yahOvAvenrum ammai appanenrum ellOrum tozhudEtta valla svayamprakAsham
